scripts.make-certs: cd deploy/dev-certs && mkcert api.localhost && cp api.localhost-key.pem api.localhost.key && cp api.localhost.pem api.localhost.crt && mkcert app.localhost && cp app.localhost-key.pem app.localhost.key && cp app.localhost.pem app.localhost.crt && mkcert example.localhost && cp example.localhost-key.pem example.localhost.key && cp example.localhost.pem example.localhost.crt && mkcert home.localhost && cp home.localhost-key.pem home.localhost.key && cp home.localhost.pem home.localhost.crt
scripts.link-all: yarn build:shared && yarn link:shared && yarn build:sdk-js && yarn link:sdk-js
scripts.unlink:shared: cd ./app && yarn unlink @eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn unlink @eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn unlink @eduvault/shared
scripts.remove:shared: cd ./app && yarn remove @eduvault/shared && rimraf node_modules/@eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn remove @eduvault/shared && rimraf node_modules/@eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn remove @eduvault/shared && rimraf node_modules/@eduvault/shared
scripts.reinstall:shared: cd ./app && yarn add @eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn add @eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn add @eduvault/shared
scripts.link:shared: cd ./shared && yarn link && cd ../app && yarn link @eduvault/shared && cd ../api && yarn link @eduvault/shared && cd ../sdk/js && yarn link @eduvault/shared
scripts.link:sdk-js: cd ./sdk/js && yarn link && cd ../../example && yarn link @eduvault/eduvault-js
scripts.d-build:app: cd app && docker build -t jewcub/eduvault_app:latest -f Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage . && docker push jewcub/eduvault_app:latest
scripts.d-build:api: cd api && docker build -t jewcub/eduvault_api:latest -f Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage . && docker push jewcub/eduvault_api:latest
scripts.d-build:example: cd example && docker build -t jewcub/eduvault_example:latest -f Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage . && docker push jewcub/eduvault_example:latest
scripts.d-build:home-page: cd home-page && docker build -t jewcub/eduvault_home-page:latest -f Dockerfile_prod --target prod-stage . && docker push jewcub/eduvault_home-page:latest
scripts.republish: run-s publish:shared remove:shared link-replace:shared publish:sdk-js remove:sdk-js link-replace:sdk-js
scripts.d-vols-clean: docker-compose down --remove-orphans && docker volume rm eduvault_example-dist-share eduvault_dist-share eduvault_example-dist-share
